title: Delivery
first_point: 1. How fast will the order be delivered?
first_point_answer: We deliver the next day after placing the order. We will pre-arrange with you a convenient delivery time.
second_point: 2. Is it possible to try on clothes before buying?
second_point_answer: Of course! Do you have the opportunity to try things on before buying and choose the right size.
third_point_answer: The delivery cost is 5 ₾. Delivery will be free if the purchase amount exceeds 50 ₾.
